rules_text:
Reach
[i]Daydream[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, look at the top three cards of target players library and put them back in any order.
[i]Locktouch[/i] – Whenever Nina, Eye Spy attacks and isn't blocked, exile the top card of each players library. You may play those cards for as long as they remain exiled and spend mana as though it was any color to cast them.
